Posts.EditableText:
Just uploaded my first game: https://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/p_ahewjpvkgx2omxsoxmoa/darkmoor

Currently in the very early stages of development. It is just a short prologue/demo at the moment but I am currently working on Act One of the story and hopefully will have it up soon. Any updates/changes will be posted here.

I welcome all feedback, good or bad! :)
Posts.HTML:
Just uploaded my first game: https://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/p_ahewjpvkgx2omxsoxmoa/darkmoor

Currently in the very early stages of development. It is just a short prologue/demo at the moment but I am currently working on Act One of the story and hopefully will have it up soon. Any updates/changes will be posted here.

I welcome all feedback, good or bad! :)
